self.title: CDISC Questionnaire CGI Generic Modification Version Test Name Terminology

definition: Clinical Global Impression Generic Modification Version test name.
name: Clinical Global Impression Generic Modification Version Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire CGI Generic Modification Version Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Clinical Global Impression Generic Modification Version Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Clinical Global Impression - Rate total change whether or not, in your judgement, it is due entirely to drug treatment. Compared to the subject's condition <at previously assessed protocol specified time point>, how much has the subject changed?

Clinical Global Impression - Rate total improvement whether or not, in your judgement, it is due entirely to drug treatment. Compared to the subject's condition <at previously assessed protocol specified time point>, how much has the subject improved?
Clinical Global Impression - Considering your total clinical experience with this particular population, how severe is the subject's condition at this time?
